ValidationRule.description: An Opportunity that is signed cannot change its stage
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(AND( TEXT( StageName ) = $Setup.Field_Service_Settings__c.Opportunity_Case_Rejection_Stage_Name__c , ISCHANGED(StageName ) , TEXT( PRIORVALUE( StageName ) ) <> $Setup.Field_Service_Settings__c.Opportunity_Case_Creation_Stage_Name__c),AND( TEXT( StageName ) = $Setup.Field_Service_Settings__c.Opportunity_Case_Rejection_Stage_Name__c , ISCHANGED(StageName ) , TEXT( PRIORVALUE( StageName ) ) <> $Setup.Field_Service_Settings__c.Opportunity_Frequency_Change_Stage_Name__c))
